Entries.GreenFlagDude.tenHearts: Hey @,^^Are you free tonight? I need to talk to you about something important.^^Meet me at the beach when you have time.^^-Levi[#]@

Entries.GreenFlagDude: If I were the rain, would I be able to connect their hearts, like how the rain connects the never-intersecting earth and sky?

Entries.GreenFlagDude0: I… I didn't think this day would come so soon, @.$l#$b#You've always been my steady ground, the person who makes everything feel possible.#$b#YTo know you feel the same about me? That's everything I could have hoped for.$l
Entries.GreenFlagDude1: $hThank you. For seeing me, for being patient, and for letting me be part of your world.#$b#I'd love nothing more than to spend my life with you.$l
